Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Have you seen how dark the cave is to the north of here?

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Crazy, isn't it? I'd love to explore it, but I don't have a light bright enough.

Nodes.name: Villager:
Nodes.text: Well, if you do go, make sure you bring a bright light with you.
